name: Confidential Strike
description:
What is it?

Confidential Strike is a game about secret agents and an old man with good gun.  The old man is a former member of the secret intelligence service who was fired, replaced by a younger agent. The old man has aged, but has not lost his shape. Now he is determined: to get inside and steal secret data - that's his goal!

Gameplay

action-platformer mixed with shooter. RUN, JUMP, SHOOT, DROP BOXES ONTO THE AGENTS and many other things you can do. Explore different levels and find all the data centers with secret data!

  • Different ways to complete levels - you can stealth and kill every agent, or you can rush ahead without looking at anything :D
  • Different enemies with its own characteristics
  • More than 10 different levels (in future versions there will be more levels, but anyway, we already have 1 BOSS)
  • Gamepad support - play on keyboard & mouse or use your gamepad
  • And many other things! :D

You can use environmental objects as your weapon.

Controls keyboard & mouse
  • W, A, S, D - movement
  • SPACEBAR - jump
  • LMB - shoot
  • R - reload gun / restart when game over
  • Shift - run
The game also supports gamepad :D Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studio)

Made with Game Maker Studio 2

All assets created by Daniel Oschepkov

Some music created by Siege, also some music (and sound effects) are taken from zvukipro and zvukogram
